cupp::kernel_impl::kernel_launcher_impl

cupp::kernel_impl::kernel_launcher_impl< F_ > Class Template Reference

Use by cupp::kernel to push arguments on the cuda function stack, call the __global__ cuda function. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename F_>
class cupp::kernel_impl::kernel_launcher_impl< F_ >

Use by cupp::kernel to push arguments on the cuda function stack, call the __global__ cuda function.

Author:
Bj√∂rn Knafla: Initial design and some enlightening comments.

Jens Breitbart

Version:
0.2
Date:
21.07.2007

const size_t  shared_mem = 0,
const int  tokens = 0 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
a A pointer to the __global__ cuda function to be called
grid_dim The dimension and size of the grid
block_dim The dimension and size of the block
shared_mem The amount of dynamic shared memory needed by the kernel
tokens The number of tokens

Member Function Documentation

template<typename F_>
void cupp::kernel_impl::kernel_launcher_impl< F_ >::configure_call (  )  [virtual]

Configures the cuda launch. Specifies the grid/block size for the next call.

Implements cupp::kernel_impl::kernel_launcher_base.

Definition at line 159 of file kernel_launcher_impl.h.

template<typename F_>
virtual boost::any cupp::kernel_impl::kernel_launcher_impl< F_ >::setup_argument ( const device &  d,
const boost::any &  arg,
const int  pos 
) [inline, virtual]

Checks if the type of arg matches the parameter pos of the __global__ cuda function. If everything is ok it will put it on the __global__ function stack.

Parameters:
arg A pointer to the to be pushed argument
pos The position to which the passed arg matches to the parameter of the __global__ function. (NOTE: first position is 1 not 0, we follow the boost naming here!)
Returns:
a pointer to the created device_copy of type kernel_type_binding<>::device_type
Warning:
You must call configure_call() before you call this function!

Implements cupp::kernel_impl::kernel_launcher_base.

Definition at line 87 of file kernel_launcher_impl.h.

template<typename F_>
static std::vector<bool> cupp::kernel_impl::kernel_launcher_impl< F_ >::dirty_parameters (  )  [inline, static]

Checks which parameters could be changed by launch().

Returns:
A vector with the size of arity. True at position 0 means the data which has been passed to the first parameter of the function could have been changed by the function call and should be marked dirty. ~ 1 only if a parameter is passed as reference
